1. Click to download the product import: 1. Click to download the product import template
2. Fill in the translated data in the te: 2. Fill in the translated data in the template
3. Contact us to import the correspondin: 3. Contact us to import the corresponding files
Always translate: Keep translation consistent across your store
Are you sure to delete this language? Af: Are you sure you want to delete this language? Deleting it will also remove all related translation data.
Authentication is required and has faile: Authentication is required and has failed or has not been provided.
Automatically switch to the target langu: Automatically switch to the target language and currency.
Based on Shopify's language limit, you c: Shopify allows up to 20 languages. To add a new one, please remove an existing language first.
Buy extra credits now to continue using: Buy extra credits now to continue using
Can I get a discount on my plan?: Can I get a discount on my plan?
Choose the right plan for you: Choose the right plan for you
Choosing Pro or Premium gives you 5 days: Choosing Pro or Premium gives you 5 days of full access to all features, along with 200,000 trial credits. Cancel anytime before the trial ends to avoid billing.
Congratulations! You’ve received a 5-day: Congratulations! Enjoy 5 days of full-feature access with your free trial.
Contact Support message: Sorry, your store is too large to continue translating. Please contact our team for support.
Create translation rules for certain wor: Define translation rules to protect brand terms and improve accuracy for industry-specific phrases.
Customers can switch languages and curre: Customers can switch languages and currencies when visiting the site.
Do extra credits affect my plan or featu: Do extra credits affect my plan or features?
Estimated number of words to translate:: Estimated number of words to translate:
Everything you need to know about pricin: Everything you need to know about pricing and billing.
Exchange rate must be a positive number: Exchange rate must be greater than 0
Get extra credits that never expire: Get extra credits that never expire
Handle needs to be used with 'Products i: Handle must be used together with ‘Products item’ or other related items.
How does the 5-day free trial work?: How does the 5-day free trial work?
How many credits do actions use?: How many credits do actions use?
How to translate with api key? Please re: Need help translating with your API key? Check out
If you leave this page, any unsaved chan: If you leave this page, any unsaved changes will be lost.
Image pixel size cannot exceed 20 millio: Image pixel size cannot exceed 20 million pixels
Moving to the free plan will turn off ke: Moving to the free plan will turn off key features. Are you sure you want to switch?
No. Plan credits come with your subscrip: No. Plan credits come with your subscription and reset monthly. Extra credits are only used when plan credits run out, and they never expire. They don't unlock new features or raise limits.
No. We do not offer refunds. You can can: No. We do not offer refunds. You can cancel anytime to stop future billing, and your plan will remain active until the end of the billing period.
No. Your unused credits stay available f: No. Your unused credits stay available for 3 months. But you'll only have access to the features included in your new (lower) plan.
Not enough translation credits. Purchase: Not enough translation credits. Purchase more to continue
Only JPEG, PNG, WEBP, HEIC and GIF forma: Only JPEG, PNG, WEBP, HEIC and GIF formats are supported
Permanent quotas · Never expire · Top up: No expiration. Reusable anytime. Top up as needed.
Plan credits reset at the end of each bi: Plan credits reset at the end of each billing cycle. But if you cancel or downgrade, any unused credits stay active for 3 more months.
Please manually start a translation task: Please start a full manual translation task first.Auto-translate only works for content updates after the initial translation is complete.
Please select a language to translate fi: Select a translation language before proceeding.
Please set a primary language before proceeding.
Please upgrade to a higher plan to remov: Please upgrade to a higher plan to remove this restriction.
Please upgrade to a higher plan to unloc: Upgrade your plan to enable this feature and enjoy seamless IP-based switching.
To unlock full features and manage languages freely, please upgrade your plan.
Select at least one language pack: Select at least one language pack
Select at least one translation item: Select at least one translation item
Some content of the store does not compl: Some store content violates OpenAI’s translation policy. Please contact us for manual support.
Strong CTA – Clear call to buy: Strong CTA – Clear call to buy
The API key is not valid: Invalid API key. Please check and try again.
The Auto IP position has been limited du: Your current plan ({{plan}}) restricts the Auto IP Position feature.
The Private API has been limited due to: The Private API has been limited due to your plan (Current plan: {{plan}})
The Translation Editor has been limited: Your current plan ({{plan}}) limits access to the Translation Editor
The exchange rate must be a positive num: Exchange rate must be greater than 0
The exchange rate must be less than 2147: The exchange rate must be less than 2147483647
The request could not be understood by t: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.
The requested resource could not be foun: The requested resource could not be found.
The server did not receive a timely resp: The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.
The server encountered an unexpected con: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.
The server received an invalid response: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.
The specified fields were not found in t: Specified fields not found in the store
The switcher is currently disabled. If y: The switcher is currently disabled. If you need IP-based automatic language and currency switching, please click “ Setup”.
The translation cannot be completed due: Translation cannot proceed because credits are exhausted.
The translation task is in progress. Ple: Translation in progress. Please wait until it finishes before starting a new task.
There are empty fields. Please complete: There are empty fields. Please complete all the required information.
This feature is available only with the: This feature is available only with the paid plan.
Title: Title
To display currency switcher, please fol: Set up your currency switcher by following the steps below:
Translation word credits have been exhau: Translation credits have been used up.
Upgrade to a paid plan to unlock this fe: Upgrade to a paid plan to unlock this feature
We calculate usage at 1 credit per word. However, if AI model is used, the consumption of prompt tokens also needs to be included—each request requires approximately an additional 80 credits. If you would like to know the estimated cost of a translation task, please feel free to contact customer support.
Welcome to our app! If you have any ques: Welcome to our app! If you have any questions, feel free to email us at support@ciwi.ai, and we will respond as soon as possible.
What happens if I upgrade my plan?: What happens if I upgrade my plan?
What happens when I run out of credits?: What happens when I run out of credits?
When using this feature, we only consume: When using your own API key, we only consume the quota of the connected service. No additional fees will be charged by us. To avoid unexpected charges, please set quota limits carefully based on your third-party API usage.
Will I lose credits if I cancel or downg: Will I lose credits if I cancel or downgrade?
Yes. You'll save 20% when you choose yea: Yes. You'll save 20% when you choose yearly billing. Discount applies automatically at checkout.
You can add up to 5 translation rules: You can add up to 5 translation rules
You can add up to {{count}} translation: Up to {{count}} rules can be added
You can select up to 5 languages at once: You can select up to 5 languages at once.
You cannot add two conflicting rules.
You clicked too frequently. Please try a: You clicked too frequently. Please try again later.
You don't have permission to access this: You don't have permission to access this resource.
You don’t have any glossary active right: You don’t have any glossary active right now
You get your new plan's credits and feat: You get your new plan's credits and features right away. Any remaining credits from your previous plan won't carry over.
You have reached your shopify plan limit: You have reached the Shopify plan limit (maximum 20 languages). Please remove some languages before adding more.
You have received 1,000 Credits, enablin: You’ve received 1,000 credits, allowing translations in over 137 languages.
You'll need to purchase extra credits to: You'll need to purchase extra credits to keep creating content. You won't lose access to features, only to credit-based actions.
Your store currently has no languages re: No languages need translation right now. Add one to get started!

translateSettings1.description1: Specialized in European and American languages, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, and similar languages with high fluency and accuracy.
translateSettings1.description2: Balanced translation for European and American languages. Focused on Western language translation with no strict adherence to style.
translateSettings1.description3: Specialized in Asian languages, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and other major Asian languages.
translateSettings1.description4: Supports most global languages. Translates a wide range of languages using direct translation.
translateSettings1.title: AI Models
translateSettings2.title: Industry Language Packs
translateSettings3.title: Translation Scope
translateSettings4.description: Applies to product and article content only. Prompts must be entered in English.
translateSettings4.placeholder1: Define the tone of the translation.e.g. Clear, Formal, Luxurious
translateSettings4.placeholder2: Reference brands with a similar voice.e.g. Apple, Tesla
translateSettings4.placeholder3: Improve accuracy with context.e.g. Fashion, Travel
translateSettings4.placeholder4: Guide the output format.e.g. Marketing, Technical
translateSettings4.placeholder5: Add optional instructions.e.g. Keep original structure
translateSettings4.title: Translation Prompt Settings
translateSettings5.description1: Translates all content regardless of existing translations, fully overwriting them.
translateSettings5.description2: Only translates content that has not yet been translated.
translateSettings5.title: Translation Update Method

Will fluctuate based on market rates.
The usage has exceeded your configured q: 사용량이 설정된 할당량을 초과했습니다. 설정을 업데이트하세요.
This language is not supported by Google: 이 언어는 Google Translate에서 지원되지 않습니다. Google에서 지원 목록을 확인하거나 다른 모델로 전환하세요.
Your private API can run only one transl: 비공개 API는 한 번에 하나의 번역만 실행할 수 있습니다. 현재 작업이 완료될 때까지 기다려 주세요.

openai.di: 데이터를 로드 중입니다. 나중에 다시 시도해 주세요.
openai.hd: API 키는 어떻게 받을 수 있나요?
openai.tf: 번역에 실패했습니다. API 키의 유효성을 확인하세요.

Select a private key for translation. On: 번역에 사용할 개인 키를 선택하세요. 목표 언어는 하나만 선택할 수 있습니다.
Choosing Pro or Unlimited gives you 5 da: Pro 또는 Unlimited를 선택하시면 모든 기능을 5일 동안 자유롭게 이용하실 수 있으며, 20만 개의 체험 크레딧도 제공됩니다. 체험 기간이 종료되기 전에 언제든지 취소하시면 요금이 청구되지 않습니다.
The Shared Plan lets you extend your pur: 공유 플랜을 사용하면 구매하신 플랜을 여러 매장으로 확장하여 각 매장에서 동일한 혜택을 누릴 수 있습니다. 이를 통해 매장 간 관리 및 협업이 간편하고 원활하게 이루어집니다.
Points balance and IP quota are not incl: 포인트 잔액과 IP 할당량은 공유에 포함되지 않습니다. 각 매장은 포인트 또는 IP 사용량이 필요한 기능에 필요한 경우 자체 포인트를 구매할 수 있습니다.
Find the store you want to bind and copy: 바인딩하려는 스토어를 찾아 스토어 URL을 복사합니다.
Download and install the official app on: 해당 스토어에서 공식 앱을 다운로드하여 설치하세요.
Share the store URL with our support tea: 스토어 URL을 지원팀에 공유하고 하위 계정 연결을 요청하세요.
